title: Cher, 73,sizzles in electric blue wig and leggy sequinned leotard during Birmingham show
text:
She performed in Europe for the first time in 15 years last month.

And Cher was keeping the crowds captivated as she showcased her sensational figure during the Birmingham leg of her Here We Go Again world tour on Saturday.

The songstress, 73, flaunted her incredible legs in a sequinned cream and blue leotard with diamond details as she took to the stage.

Dazzle: her was keeping the crowds captivated as she showcased her sensational figure during the Birmingham leg of her Here We Go Again world tour on Saturday

The stunning leotard cut high on the Believe hitmaker's toned legs, with the star adding matching ankle boots.

She donned an electric blue wig and highlighted her youthful features were metallic shadow and frosted lipgloss.

The leotard featured statement shoulder pads for an edgy look.

Dance: The songstress, 73, flaunted her incredible legs in a sequinned cream and blue leotard with diamond details as she took to the stage

Dazzle: Cher later wrapped up in a sequin lavender toga as she took to the stage.

Wow: Shimmer: The stunning leotard cut high on the Believe hitmaker's toned legs, with the star adding matching ankle boots

Cher later wrapped up in a sequin lavender toga as she took to the stage.,

The Here We Go Again Tour is the seventh solo concert tour by the American star, in support of her 26th studio album Dancing Queen.

The tour is the first world tour since her Living Proof: The Farewell Tour, which took place between 2002–2005.

Here We Go Again kicked off in September 2018, and will conclude on 19 December 2019.

Dance: Cher was surrounded by dancers in Roman inspired attire as she worked the stage
description: Cher was keeping the crowds captivated as she showcased her sensational figure during the Birmingham leg of her Here We Go Again world tour on Saturday.
